languages.text: {n}Соломон не сводит тяжелого взгляда с кибермастифа.{/n} "Было бы неплохо хотя бы знать, что я сделал все возможное, чтобы Глейто выбрался отсюда. А там... посмотрим".
{n}Solomorne does not lift his heavy gaze from the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "It would be nice to at least know that I did everything I could to get Glaito out of here. Beyond that... we'll see."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон не сводит тяжелого взгляда с кибермастифа.{/n} "Было бы неплохо хотя бы знать, что я сделал все возможное, чтобы Глейто выбрался отсюда. А там... посмотрим".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは重い視線をひたすらサイバーマスチフに向けていた。{/n}「せめて、グライトをここから脱出させるためにできる限りのことをした、言えるだけでも救われるだろう。その後のことは…成り行き次第だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not lift his heavy gaze from the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "It would be nice to at least know that I did everything I could to get Glaito out of here. Beyond that... we'll see."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは重い視線をひたすらサイバーマスチフに向けていた。{/n}「せめて、グライトをここから脱出させるためにできる限りのことをした、言えるだけでも救われるだろう。その後のことは…成り行き次第だ」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne wendet seinen schweren Blick nicht von dem Cyber-Mastiff ab.{/n} "Es wäre schön, wenigstens zu wissen, dass ich alles getan habe, um Glaito hier rauszubringen. Und danach ... wir werden sehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not lift his heavy gaze from the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "It would be nice to at least know that I did everything I could to get Glaito out of here. Beyond that... we'll see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne wendet seinen schweren Blick nicht von dem Cyber-Mastiff ab.{/n} "Es wäre schön, wenigstens zu wissen, dass ich alles getan habe, um Glaito hier rauszubringen. Und danach ... wir werden sehen."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne garde le regard rivé sur le cyber-mastiff.{/n} « C'est vrai que j'aimerais au moins pouvoir me dire que j'ai tout fait pour sauver Glaito. Pour le reste... nous verrons bien. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not lift his heavy gaze from the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "It would be nice to at least know that I did everything I could to get Glaito out of here. Beyond that... we'll see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne garde le regard rivé sur le cyber-mastiff.{/n} « C'est vrai que j'aimerais au moins pouvoir me dire que j'ai tout fait pour sauver Glaito. Pour le reste... nous verrons bien. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne no aparta su mirada apesadumbrada del cibermastín.{/n} «Me consolaría saber que he hecho todo lo posible por sacar a Glaito de aquí. Aparte de eso... ya veremos».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not lift his heavy gaze from the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "It would be nice to at least know that I did everything I could to get Glaito out of here. Beyond that... we'll see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne no aparta su mirada apesadumbrada del cibermastín.{/n} «Me consolaría saber que he hecho todo lo posible por sacar a Glaito de aquí. Aparte de eso... ya veremos».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙沉重的目光依然盯着索罗蒙。{/n}“至少你让我看到，我做了一切能做的事情，想让格雷托活着离开这里，这就足够了。至于别的事情……再说吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not lift his heavy gaze from the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "It would be nice to at least know that I did everything I could to get Glaito out of here. Beyond that... we'll see."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙沉重的目光依然盯着索罗蒙。{/n}“至少你让我看到，我做了一切能做的事情，想让格雷托活着离开这里，这就足够了。至于别的事情……再说吧。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, bakışlarını siber mastiften ayırmıyor.{/n} "Hiç değilse Glaito'yu buraya getirebilmek için yapabileceğim her şeyi yaptığımı bilmek güzel olurdu. Gerisiyse... Orasını göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not lift his heavy gaze from the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "It would be nice to at least know that I did everything I could to get Glaito out of here. Beyond that... we'll see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, bakışlarını siber mastiften ayırmaz.{/n} "Hiç değilse Glaito'yu buraya getirebilmek için yapabileceğim her şeyi yaptığımı bilmek güzel olurdu. Gerisiniyse... Göreceğiz.
